reviewText: A beautiful scientist travels to a remote castle in order to assist a mysterious Baron w/ his experiments in regenerating dead tissue. Unfortunately, there's also a maniacal murderer on the loose, killing off the local women! Gothic and rather slow, SCREAM OF THE DEMON LOVER is far more sedate than it's title might imply, though it does have its moments. The final revelation, while not a big surprise, is well done, and makes up for some of the preceding tedium. Worth a watch...
